attributes.action: put pressure on the international community to force Robert Mugabe out of power in Zimbabwe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people of Zimbabwe are dying....now.  Under Robert Mugabe's rule the health and well-being of his people have dropped dramatically, which is as much an abuse of human rights as arbitrary arrest and torture.  

Zimbabwe has the world’s shortest life expectancy—37 years for men and 34 for women and has the greatest percentage of orphans.

How can we 'liberate' Iraq yet stand by and do nothing as thousands die of abuse and neglect and millions are starving.

It is time to make history and stand beside the people of Zimbabwe in their time of need.

We call upon Mr Brown and the British Government to do everything possible to remove Mr Mugabe from power and to deliver aid to the Zimbabwean people right now in their suffering.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
